scripts.install-corepack: brew install corepack && corepack enable && corepack install
scripts.update-pnpm: corepack install -g pnpm@latest && corepack up && corepack use pnpm
scripts.update//: echo Updates packages and lockfile. (`pnpm i` is required because `pnpm up` creates non-deterministic lockfile)
scripts.rm-node-modules//: echo Removes all `node_modules/` from all workspaces
scripts.clean-update//: echo Removes everything before updating packages
scripts.clean-update: rm -f pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm cache delete && pnpm run rm-node-modules && pnpm run update
